goal.name: m00_small_inspection_area
goal.title: M00 - ALL Equipment Fits in Small Inspection Area

goal.name: m07_robot_dance
goal.title: M07 - Robot Dance - Robot Dancing on Dance Floor at End of Match

goal.name: m06_pull_up_bar_pass_under
goal.title: M06 - Pull-Up Bar - Pass Completely Under Bar

goal.name: m06_pull_up_holds_robot_end
goal.title: M06 - Pull-Up Bar - Holds 100% Robot Weight at End

goal.name: m01_innovation_project
goal.title: M01 - Innovation Project - Touching RePLAY Logo or Gray Bench Area

goal.name: m14_health_units_touching_logo_gray
goal.title: M14 - Health Units - Touching RePLAY Logo or Gray Bench Area

goal.name: m14_health_units_looped_over_pullup_bar
goal.title: M14 - Health Units - Looped over Pull-Up bar Posts Touching NO Equipment

goal.name: m04_bench_cubes_hopscotch
goal.title: M04 - Bench - Flat Down - # Spaces w/Cube in Hopscotch

goal.name: m03_slide_figures_off
goal.title: M03 - Slide - Slide Figures Off Slide

goal.name: m03_slide_figure_home
goal.title: M03 - Slide Figure Completely in Home

goal.name: m03_slide_figure_heavy_tire
goal.title: M03 - Slide Figure Completely on Heavy Black Tire

goal.name: m09_tire_light_blue_white_center_up
goal.title: M09 - Tire Flip - Light Blue Tire White Center UP

goal.name: m09_tire_flip_black_tire_white_center_up
goal.title: M09 - Tire Flip - Heavy Black Tire White Center UP

goal.name: m09_tire_flip_white_center_in_large_target
goal.title: M09 - Tire Flip - White Center Up Tires Completely in Large Target Circle

goal.name: m10_cell_phone
goal.title: M10 - Cell Phone - White Side Up Resting on Only the Mat

goal.name: m08_cubes_in_frame_target
goal.title: M08 - Boccia - # Cubes Completely in Frame or Target

goal.name: m08_boccia_yellow_cube
goal.title: M08 - Boccia - Yellow Cube Completely In Target

goal.name: m15_precision_tokens
goal.title: M15 - Precision Tokens Remaining on Field

restriction.message: Cannot score Figure In Home if no figure off slide
Cannot score Figure on Tire if no figure off slide
Cannot score Cubes in Hopscotch unless Bench is Down Flat
Cannot Score Both Robot Dance at end of match and Robot is Hanging on Pull Up bar at end of Match
Cannot score both figure in home and on Tire if 2 Figures not off slide

subjectiveCategory.name: project
subjectiveCategory.title: Innovation Project
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: Teams should communicate to the judges their achievement in each of the criteria below. This rubric should be filled out during the Innovation Project presentation. Judges are required to tick one box on each separate line to indicate the level the team has achieved. If the team exceeds, please make a short comment in the Exceeds box.

goalGroup.title: Identify
goalGroup.description: - Team had a clearly defined problem that it was well researched.

goal.name: identify_1
goal.title: Identify1
goal.description: Team had a clearly defined problem that was well researched.

range.shortDescription: Problem not clearly defined
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partially clear definition of the problem
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Fully clear definition of the problem
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goal.name: identify_2
goal.title: Identify2
goal.description: Team had a clearly defined problem that was well researched.

range.shortDescription: Minimal research
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Some research but quality unclear
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Wide variety of quality research
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goalGroup.title: Design
goalGroup.description: - Team generated innovative ideas independently before selecting and planning which one to develop.

goal.name: design_1
goal.title: Design1
goal.description: Team generated innovative ideas independently before selecting and planning which one to develop.

range.shortDescription: Minimal idea generation across the team
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Evidence of some ideas from across the team
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Evidence of a lot of ideas from across the team
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goal.name: innovation
goal.title: Design1
goal.description: Team generated innovative ideas independently before selecting and planning which one to develop.

range.shortDescription: Minimal planning with some team members included
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Some effective planning with some team members included
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Highly effective planning including all team members
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goalGroup.title: Create
goalGroup.description: - Team developed an original idea or built on an existing one with a prototype model/drawing to represent their solution.

goal.name: create_1
goal.title: Create1
goal.description: Team developed an original idea or built on an existign one with a prototype model/drawing to represent their solution.

range.shortDescription: Minimal development of innovative solution
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial development of innovative solution
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: A lof of development of innovative solution
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goal.name: create_2
goal.title: Create2
goal.description: Team developed an original idea or built on an existign one with a prototype model/drawing to represent their solution.

range.shortDescription: No model/drawing of solution

range.shortDescription: Simple model/drawing which helps to share the solution
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Detailed model/drawing which helps to share the solution
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goalGroup.title: Iterate
goalGroup.description: - Team shared their ideas, collected feedback and included improvements in their solution.

goal.name: goal_0
goal.title: Iterate1
goal.description: Team shared their ideas, collected feedback and included improvements in their solution.

range.shortDescription: A lot of sharing of their solution
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: Communicate
goalGroup.description: - Team shared a creative and effective presentation of their current solution and its impact on their users.

subjectiveCategory.name: core_values
subjectiveCategory.title: Core Values
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: The Core Values should be the lense through which you watch the team's presentations. All team members should be demonstrating the Core Values in everything they do. This rubric should be used to record the Core Values observed throughout the judging session.

goalGroup.title: Discovery
goalGroup.description: - Team explored new skills and ideas.

range.shortDescription: Multiple examples observed across the team.

subjectiveCategory.name: robot_design
subjectiveCategory.title: Robot Design
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: Teams should communicate to the judges their achievement in each of the criteria below. This rubric should be filled out during the Robot Design explanation. Judges are required to tick one box on each separate line to indicate the level the team has achieved. If the team exceeds, please make a short comment in the Exceeds box.

goalGroup.title: Identify
goalGroup.description: - Team had a clearly defined mission strategy and explored building and coding skills they needed.

range.shortDescription: No clear mission strategy
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partially clear mission strategy
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Fully clear mission strategy
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: Some team members learned building and coding skills

range.shortDescription: Many team members learned building and coding skills
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: All team members learned building and coding skills
range.title: Accomplished

nonNumericCategory.title: Breakthrough Award
nonNumericCategory.description: A team that made significant progress in their confidence and capability and who understand that what they discover is more important than what they win.

nonNumericCategory.title: Rising All-Star
nonNumericCategory.description: A team that the judges notice and expect great things from in the future.

nonNumericCategory.title: Motivate
nonNumericCategory.description: A team that embraces the culture of FIRST LEGO League through team building, team spirit and displayed enthusiasm.

nonNumericCategory.title: Engineering Excellence
nonNumericCategory.description: This award celebrates a team with an efficiently designed robot, an innovative project solution that effectively addresses the season challenge and great Core Values evident in all they do.
